entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improvements to unused value analyzer and code fixes #58141
  • Code Cleanup and Run Code Analysis should be hidden when no solution is loaded #58138
  • "Implement all members explicitly" action generates wrong code for static interface properties #58136
    17.1
  • cw snippet adds global::System.Console when i use it on lambda expressions. #58135
  • Intellisense suggesting code improvement not supported for the project's C# version #58133
  • Warnlevel 6 warnings were not documented #58132
  • Rename doesn't work on methods passed as parameters #58131
  • Unable to use external libraries in source generators #58130
  • Code Analysis tooling issues with editorconfig #58129
  • Proposal: Combine overload for IncrementalValuesProvider<T> #58127

Closed

  • Intellisense tooltip should show docs from <exception> tag. #58140
  • C# code snippet for region violating document EOL sequence #58134
  • CS8073 false possitive for linq to SQL #57852
  • Question: Global using support for `CSharpCompilationOptions` #58119

PullRequests

Created

  • Update publishdata.json to point to correct VS branch #58142
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58139
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • BoundDecisionDag.Rewrite - Avoid capturing the replacement map #58137
    Area-Compilers, Community

Merged

  • Skip correct TestLargeStringConcatenation test #58058
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure, Test, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58066
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #58125
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58126
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Lazy load ISourceLinkService to reduce DLL loads #58108
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #58124
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58123
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #58144
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58143
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Avoid calculating inferred delegate type unnecessarily in conversions and type inference #58115
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
  • Report a level 7 warning for lower-cased type names #56905
    Area-Compilers
  • Use !! in AddParameterCheck refactoring #57934
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for interpolations in raw string literals. #57979
    Area-Compilers
  • Make scripting work in single-file deployments #57910
    Area-Interactive, Community
  • Add support for nullable analysis in interpolated string handler constructors #57780
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement Naming Styles for editorconfig UI #58075
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • API for getting a deterministic key for a Compilation #57134
    Area-Compilers
  • Use `ldlen` to get array's Length during pattern-matching. #58114
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, New Feature - Extended Property Patterns, 17.1
  • Adjust doc comment for `SyntaxFactory.ParseTokens` API #58064
    Area-Compilers
  • Handling defaults provided by IAsyncCompletionDefaultsSource #57685
    Area-IDE
  • Allow xml docs to still be created when 'emit metadata only' is on. #57667
    Area-Compilers
  • Add external access to stacktrace APIs for Unit Testing #58082
    Area-IDE
  • List patterns: Skip compiler-generated dag nodes for better codegen #57909
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Run builds with $TempDir redirected to a new drive #58105
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.1
  • Method group conversion caching redo #57882
    Area-Compilers, Community
